name: usergroups.list
desc: List all User Groups for a team.

include_count.desc: Include the number of users in each User Group.

include_disabled.desc: Include results for disabled User Groups.

include_users.desc: Include the list of users for each User Group.

team_id.desc: The user group's encoded team ID. Required if org token is used.
